data.market_trends: Growing interest in sustainable travel and adventure tourism. Interest in off-the-beaten-path destinations also benefits Iceland's appeal in winter.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers prioritize unique experiences over lavish accommodations. Many now research extensively online before booking their trips.
data.competitive_landscape: Iceland remains competitive due to its unique offerings. While nearby countries provide similar experiences, few can match Iceland's diverse landscapes and activities in wintertime.
data.seasonal_factors: Winter influences include school holidays and popular holiday seasons driving trends. Demand peaks during these times due to family travel and vacation packages.
